we love to see blanket your knits cast on 112 130 156 210 sts abbreviations work in garter stitch knit every row until piece measures 2 from cast-on k - knit p - purl set-up row ws k10 pm purl to last 10 sts pm pm - place marker knit to end rs - right side these markers locate the garter edges sm - slip marker st s - stitch es row 1 rs knit slipping all markers as you ws - wrong side come to them row 2 ws knit to marker sm purl to marker sm knit to end work row 1-2 a total of 8 times this is 16 row work row 1 once more set-up row ws knit to marker sm p10 pm k35 40 45 65 pm p47 60 81 115 sm knit to end the two additional markers locate the offset garter square within the blanket row 3 rs knit slipping all markers as you come to them row 4 ws knit to marker sm purl to marker sm twice knit to end work row 3-4 a total of 34 39 44 64 times this is 68 78 88 128 row on the last row remove the second and third markers the offset square is complete row 5 rs knit slipping all markers as you come to them row 6 ws knit to marker sm purl to marker sm knit to end work row 5-6 until blanket measures 26 30 38 50 from cast-on or 2 short of desired length work in garter stitch knit every row for 2 bind off all sts loosely malt blanket facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3
